Class OperationManager

main.OperationManager
public class OperationManager extends Object

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    createUser()
    Prompts to create a new user with a unique username and password, validates the input, and adds the user with associated wallets If input validation fails, the method retries until valid input is provided
    void
    createWallets(User user)
    Creates walletsand initializes each wallet with a starting wealth of 10 coins.
    void
    cryptoTransaction()
    Creates a crypto transaction between 2 users Prompts user to specify transaction details Handles exceptions such as invalid coin selection and transaction errors
    void
    currencyTransaction()
    Facilitates a currency transaction between 2 users Prompts for user input to specify transaction details Handles exceptions such as invalid currency selection and transaction errors
    void
    deleteUser()
    Deletes a user after confirming their credentials If no users exist, prompts the creation of a new user
    void
    listOfCryptos()
    Displays a list of supported cryptocurrencies for transactions
    void
    listOfCurrency()
    Displays a list of supported currencies for transactions
    void
    seeTransactions()
    Displays transactions categorizing them into currency and crypto transactions If one is missing it will display the other one
    void
    seeUsers()
    Displays information about all users If no users exist, prompts the creation of a new user
    User[]
    userTransactionChecker()
    Checks users information of transactions, including both remitent and destinatary users
    void
    walletUser()
    Displays the wallets associated with a user after authentication Prompts for username and password Allows users to create a new account if no users exist

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      public OperationManager()

  • Method Details

    • createUser

      public void createUser()
      Prompts to create a new user with a unique username and password, validates the input, and adds the user with associated wallets If input validation fails, the method retries until valid input is provided

    • createWallets

      public void createWallets(User user)
      Creates walletsand initializes each wallet with a starting wealth of 10 coins.
      Parameters:
      user - for assigning the wallets to him

    • seeUsers

      public void seeUsers()
      Displays information about all users If no users exist, prompts the creation of a new user

    • deleteUser

      public void deleteUser()
      Deletes a user after confirming their credentials If no users exist, prompts the creation of a new user

    • seeTransactions

      public void seeTransactions()
      Displays transactions categorizing them into currency and crypto transactions If one is missing it will display the other one

    • userTransactionChecker

      public User[] userTransactionChecker()
      Checks users information of transactions, including both remitent and destinatary users
      Returns:
      an array containing the remitent at 0 and the destinatary at 1

    • listOfCryptos

      public void listOfCryptos()
      Displays a list of supported cryptocurrencies for transactions

    • cryptoTransaction

      public void cryptoTransaction()
      Creates a crypto transaction between 2 users Prompts user to specify transaction details Handles exceptions such as invalid coin selection and transaction errors

    • listOfCurrency

      public void listOfCurrency()
      Displays a list of supported currencies for transactions

    • currencyTransaction

      public void currencyTransaction()
      Facilitates a currency transaction between 2 users Prompts for user input to specify transaction details Handles exceptions such as invalid currency selection and transaction errors

    • walletUser

      public void walletUser()
      Displays the wallets associated with a user after authentication Prompts for username and password Allows users to create a new account if no users exist
